    Unreliable Cops Mafia

    Setup:
    1 mafia godfather - Investigations return a result of "innocent"
    1 mafia framer - May target one player each night. Any investigation of that player will return a result of "guilty"
    1 town miller - Investigations return a result of "guilty"
    4 town cops - Once per night, PM me the name of a player. You will receive a result of "innocent" or "guilty"

    Sample Role PMs:
    You are a Cop
    You are the Miller
    You are Mafia

    Mafia has daychat Day 1 only

    Living Players:
    1. shadowlancerx
    2. ophidia
    3. zomgarcwind
    4. D_V
    5. anaklusmos
    6. mete0rshower (mentor: Bur)
    7. gentleman johnny

    Currently Seeking Replacements

    Spectators:
    1. silvercrys
    PM me for spec chat link

    It is currently day 1
